I started playing cricket in the year 2007-08. Three years after the movie was released. From a boy who hated cricket to a semi-professional cricketer, it has truly been an incredible journey for me. Tears roll down my eyes when I hear the song Aashayein. Only the people who make it big are always recognized and there are millions like me who fall apart. Whenever you feel like giving up, just listen to the song Aashayein and say to yourself that it's OK and you'll be alright. Life has always been good and it will always be that way. Cheers.
